data.name: Ansiolisis
data.detailed_description:
Ansiolisis (or Anxiolysis) is a short interactive narrative text-based adventure over a dream of someone with anxiety.

"A short history about falling", the game consists on a series of passages, narratives and poems with an unsetting atmospheric ost, to uncover (and relate) to the situation of falling and anxiety
data.about_the_game:
Ansiolisis (or Anxiolysis) is a short interactive narrative text-based adventure over a dream of someone with anxiety.

"A short history about falling", the game consists on a series of passages, narratives and poems with an unsetting atmospheric ost, to uncover (and relate) to the situation of falling and anxiety
data.short_description: Ansiolisis (or Anxiolysis) is a short interactive narrative text-based adventure over a dream of someone with anxiety.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • Storage: 325 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It will probably run on any PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 320M or higher, or Radeon HD 2400 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: it isnt tested on m1 machines
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: depictions of suicide and some strong language
